page.title: 08F/Education in Manchester
page.content: It is said that the city contains the greatest concentration of students in Higher Education in Western Europe. Undergraduate and Graduate studies in the Arts, Sciences, Technology and Medecine take place in an area centred on either side of Oxford Road. The Victoria University of Manchester, the University of Manchester Institute of Science and Technology plus the Manchester Business School all have students from Britain and abroad. The Manchester Polytechnic is the culmination of a process of federation, amalgamation and absorption of a number of Colleges and the courses cover teacher education, community studies, industrial and manufacturing studies, and art and design. With the Teaching Hospitals and the Royal Northern College of Music there is a vast choice of work.
